treatment-md.title: Mesamphiagrion dunklei Ellenrieder & Garrison, 2008, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Oreiallagma gen. nov. with a redefinition of Cyanallagma Kennedy 1920 and Mesamphiagrion Kennedy 1920, and the description of M. dunklei sp. nov. and M. ecuatoriale sp. nov. from Ecuador (Odonata: Coenagrionidae)
